items.title: Custom Triggers
items.content:
Create personalized trigger words to customize how Zen AI responds to your queries.

## Trigger Word Management

### Creating Custom Triggers

1. **Access Settings**: Go to Settings > Triggers
2. **Add New Trigger**: Click 'Add Trigger'
3. **Define Keywords**: Enter trigger words or phrases
4. **Link to Notes**: Connect trigger to specific notes
5. **Set Priority**: Define trigger importance level

### Advanced Trigger Types

#### Exact Match Triggers

```json
{
  "type": "exact",
  "keywords": ["chocolate cake", "birthday cake"],
  "notes": ["allergy_info", "favorite_recipes"]
}
```

#### Fuzzy Match Triggers

```json
{
  "type": "fuzzy",
  "keywords": ["bake", "cooking", "recipe"],
  "similarity_threshold": 0.8,
  "notes": ["kitchen_notes"]
}
```

#### Contextual Triggers

```json
{
  "type": "contextual",
  "conditions": {
    "time_of_day": "evening",
    "topic": "food",
    "mood": "casual"
  },
  "notes": ["relaxed_recipes"]
}
```

### Best Practices

- **Be specific**: Use precise trigger words
- **Test regularly**: Verify trigger effectiveness
- **Update frequently**: Keep triggers current
- **Use categories**: Group related triggers

![Trigger Management Interface](/images/trigger-interface.png)

items.title: Batch Processing
items.content:
Process multiple documents simultaneously for efficient bulk operations.

## Batch Operations

### Document Upload

Upload multiple files at once:

- **Drag & Drop**: Select multiple files
- **Folder Upload**: Upload entire directories
- **Cloud Sync**: Import from cloud storage
- **API Upload**: Programmatic bulk upload

### Processing Options

```javascript
// Batch upload example
const batchUpload = await zenAI.batchUpload({
  files: fileList,
  options: {
    extractText: true,
    generateTriggers: true,
    categorize: true,
    priority: 'high'
  }
});
```

### Progress Tracking

Monitor batch operations with real-time updates:

- **Progress bars**: Visual progress indication
- **Status updates**: Current operation status
- **Error reporting**: Failed file notifications
- **Completion notifications**: Success/failure alerts

### Batch Processing Limits

| Plan | Files per Batch | Total Size | Processing Speed |
|------|----------------|------------|------------------|
| Free | 10 | 50MB | Standard |
| Pro | 100 | 500MB | Fast |
| Enterprise | Unlimited | Unlimited | Priority |

![Batch Processing Dashboard](/images/batch-dashboard.png)

items.title: Export Options
items.content:
Export your notes and conversations in various formats for external use.

## Export Formats

### Document Formats

- **PDF**: Professional document format
- **Word (.docx)**: Microsoft Word compatible
- **Markdown**: Plain text with formatting
- **HTML**: Web-ready format
- **JSON**: Structured data format

### Export Examples

#### PDF Export

```javascript
const pdfExport = await zenAI.export({
  format: 'pdf',
  notes: ['note1', 'note2'],
  options: {
    includeMetadata: true,
    pageNumbers: true,
    tableOfContents: true
  }
});
```

#### JSON Export

```json
{
  "export_version": "1.0",
  "notes": [
    {
      "id": "note_123",
      "title": "Chocolate Cake Recipe",
      "content": "Ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa...",
      "triggers": ["cake", "chocolate", "recipe"],
      "created": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
      "modified": "2024-01-20T14:45:00Z"
    }
  ],
  "conversations": [
    {
      "id": "chat_456",
      "messages": [
        {"role": "user", "content": "Tell me a cake recipe"},
        {"role": "assistant", "content": "Here's a great recipe..."}
      ],
      "context_used": ["note_123"]
    }
  ]
}
```

### Export Scheduling

- **One-time exports**: Immediate download
- **Scheduled exports**: Daily/weekly/monthly
- **Automated backups**: Cloud storage integration
- **API webhooks**: Trigger external systems

![Export Interface](/images/export-options.png)

items.title: Collaboration Tools
items.content:
Share and collaborate on documents with team members securely.

## Team Collaboration

### Sharing Options

- **Public links**: Share with anyone
- **Team sharing**: Share with specific team members
- **Role-based access**: Viewer, Editor, Admin roles
- **Temporary access**: Time-limited sharing

### Real-time Collaboration

```javascript
// Collaborative editing
const session = await zenAI.startCollaboration({
  noteId: 'note_123',
  participants: ['user1@example.com', 'user2@example.com'],
  permissions: {
    canEdit: true,
    canComment: true,
    canShare: false
  }
});
```

### Comment System

- **Inline comments**: Comment on specific text
- **Threaded discussions**: Organized comment threads
- **Mention notifications**: @user notifications
- **Comment resolution**: Mark comments as resolved

### Version Control

- **Change tracking**: See who made what changes
- **Version history**: Access previous versions
- **Conflict resolution**: Merge conflicting changes
- **Rollback capability**: Revert to previous versions

### Security Features

- **End-to-end encryption**: Secure collaboration
- **Audit logs**: Track all access and changes
- **Two-factor authentication**: Enhanced security
- **Compliance**: GDPR and SOC 2 compliant

![Collaboration Interface](/images/collaboration-tools.png)

items.title: Version Control
items.content:
Track changes and maintain version history for all your documents.

## Version Management

### Automatic Versioning

Every change is automatically tracked:

- **Content changes**: Text modifications
- **Metadata updates**: Title, tags, triggers
- **File attachments**: Added or removed files
- **Collaborator changes**: Team member edits

### Version History

```json
{
  "note_id": "note_123",
  "versions": [
    {
      "version": 1,
      "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:00:00Z",
      "author": "user@example.com",
      "changes": "Initial creation",
      "size": 1024
    },
    {
      "version": 2,
      "timestamp": "2024-01-16T14:30:00Z",
      "author": "user@example.com",
      "changes": "Updated recipe instructions",
      "size": 1156
    }
  ]
}
```

### Version Comparison

- **Diff view**: See exactly what changed
- **Side-by-side comparison**: Compare any two versions
- **Change highlighting**: Visual change indicators
- **Revert options**: Restore previous versions

### Backup & Recovery

- **Automatic backups**: Daily cloud backups
- **Point-in-time recovery**: Restore to any point
- **Data integrity**: Checksum verification
- **Disaster recovery**: Cross-region replication

### Storage Optimization

- **Deduplication**: Eliminate duplicate data
- **Compression**: Reduce storage footprint
- **Archival**: Move old versions to cold storage
- **Retention policies**: Automatic cleanup rules

![Version Control Interface](/images/version-history.png)
